revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Network Everywhere |model=NR041 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |type=router |est_release_date=01/2003 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX84200-11;CX84200-11, 0350Y1C4, ARM, 0352, Taiwan; |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ATTC-90 |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, 3.3V TTL, (115200,8,N,1),, |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=metal case |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:06:25 }} {{TagLine|Cable/DSL 4-Port Router}}
This model appears to also be known as the [[Network Everywhere NWR04B]] in Canada.
===Serial Port=== 8-pin serial header near the front of the board, beside the PCMCIA header: * Pin 3 - RX * Pin 5 - GND * Pin 7 - TX
===JTAG=== * Standard 14-pin [[:Category:JTAG|EJTAG]] [http://www.jtagtest.com/pinouts/ header] * SRST doesn't seem to work * Debug mode appears to be disabled
